“This one?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:50}); // {Aeris}

my Materia's all gone!!”

“She was probably eyeing our

get our Materia back!”

dialogStrings: Wilderness
“Wait, wait, wait, wai----t!!”

{Aeris}
“What!?
What happened all of a sudden?”

{Barret}
“What!?
The hell happened all of a sudden!?”

{Tifa}
“What the--?
Did something happen?”

{Red XIII}
“What happened all of a sudden?
Don't scare me like that!”

{Cait Sith}
“Wh, wh, what is it, all of a sudden!?
Don't scare me like that!”

{Cid}
“What the HELL is it!
Shoutin' out and jumpin' in front of me
all of a sudden!”

{Vincent}
“What happened all of a sudden?
Did something happen?”

{Yuffie}
“I know this area pretty well.”{PAUSE}“It gets pretty tough past here.
Better get ready…”

{Aeris}
“…Hmmm…
Something's fishy…”{PAUSE}“You're not planning
something sneaky again, are you?”

{Aeris}
“……Hmmm…
Something's fishy…”{PAUSE}“You're not planning
something sneaky again, are you?”

{Barret}
“Hah, I know what you're thinkin'.
And you sayin' that just now means
you're up to somethin'! Right!?”

{Barret}
“…You serious?
And you sayin' that just now means
you're up to somethin'! Right!?”{PAUSE}“I don't trust you.”

{Tifa}
“…Really?
Somehow, I don't believe it.”{PAUSE}“Are you trying to con us again?”

{Tifa}
“…Really?
Something tells me I
shouldn't trust you.”{PAUSE}“Are you going to trick us again?”

{Red XIII}
“Hmm…
Smells fishy.”{PAUSE}“Are you going to trick us again?”

{Red XIII}
“Hmm…
Smells fishy.”{PAUSE}“My nose never lies!”

{Cait Sith}
“You serious?
I can't trust you.”{PAUSE}“But then again, I guess I shouldn't talk.”

{Cid}
“Hey!
You serious?”{PAUSE}“If you're trying to con us,
you won't get away with it!”

{Vincent}
“Further down?
I don't see any signs of danger…”{PAUSE}“There's something unnatural
in the way {Yuffie}'s acting…”

{Yuffie}
“No!
It's REALLY tough…”
“There they are, catch 'em!!”

{Cloud}
“Shinra!?”

{Tifa}
“Shinra!?”

{Aeris}
“The Shinra!?”

{Barret}
“The Shinra!!”

{Cait Sith}
“That's Sh…Shinra's…”

{Cid}
“What, the Shinra!?”

{Red XIII}
“It's Shinra!!”

{Vincent}
“The Shinra!”

Shinra Soldier
“Hey, that's not them!
These are the other guys from before!!”

{Aeris}
“{Yuffie}, did you by any chance…”

{Barret}
“{Yuffie}, so you're…”

{Tifa}
“{Yuffie}, you're not…”

{Red XIII}
“So you were, {Yuffie}!!”

{Cait Sith}
“Not bad, {Yuffie}, not bad at all.”

{Cid}
“{Yuffie}!
You sure got some nerve, kid!”

{Vincent}
“So what does this mean?
You will explain later.”

{Yuffie}
“I didn't know!
I had nothing to do with this one!”

{Aeris}
“This one?
What do you mean 'THIS one'?”{PAUSE}“So you WERE up to something!”

{Barret}
“Whaddya mean 'this one'!?
'This one'?”{PAUSE}“So you WERE plannin' somethin'!!”

{Tifa}
“This one?
Did you just say 'THIS one'?”{PAUSE}“So you WERE trying something!”

{Red XIII}
“What do you mean 'this one'?
'THIS one'?”{PAUSE}“So you were concocting some evil scheme!!”

{Cait Sith}
“This one?
What do you mean 'THIS one'?”{PAUSE}“So you were planning
on tricking us!”

{Cid}
“Whaddya mean 'THIS one'?
'THIS one'!?”{PAUSE}“So you WERE planning some crooked $%*&!!”

{Vincent}
“What do you mean, 'This one'?”{PAUSE}“You had something else in mind?”

{Yuffie}
“No, umm, uh…”

Shinra Soldier
“What should we do!?”

Shinra Soldier
“Uh…Get them!
Grab them and ask questions later!!”

{Aeris}
“What's going on!?”{PAUSE}“I thought something was missing…
my Materia's all gone!!”

{Barret}
“The hell's goin' on!?”{PAUSE}“I knew somethin' was missing.
All my Materia's gone!!”

{Tifa}
“What's going on!?”{PAUSE}“I thought something was odd…
My, my Materia is missing!!”

{Red XIII}
“What's going on?”{PAUSE}“I thought something was funny,
my Materia's disappeared!!”

{Cait Sith}
“What's going on!?”{PAUSE}“Something's missing…my
Materia…it's gone!!”

{Cid}
“What the hell's goin' on?”{PAUSE}“I knew I was missing something…
My Materia's gone!!”

{Vincent}
“I thought something was wrong.
So that's it.”{PAUSE}“My Materia's been stolen…”

{Cloud}
“Hey…where's {Yuffie}?”

{Aeris}
“Hey…where's {Yuffie}?”

{Tifa}
“Hey…where's {Yuffie}?”

{Barret}
“Yo…where's
that $#@^% {Yuffie}?”

{Red XIII}
“Hey…where's {Yuffie}?”

{Cait Sith}
“Now…where's {Yuffie}?”

{Cid}
“Ey…where the hell's that damn kid?”

{Vincent}
“…”

{Aeris}
“I'm SO mad!!”

{Barret}
“That &*&$ kid!!!”{PAUSE}“Grrrrrgh!! Arrrrrgh
Uhhhhhhhhhhhh!!”

{Tifa}
“She's done it again!!”{PAUSE}“I'll never forgive her!”

{Red XIII}
“ZOUNDS!!”{PAUSE}“Grrrrrrrgh…
Grrrgh! Grrrrrgh!!”

{Cait Sith}
“She's done it again!”{PAUSE}“She sure took us for fools!”

{Cid}
“That little ^%#^$@!!”{PAUSE}“Takin' me for a fool!!”

{Vincent}
“Inexcusable…”

{Aeris}
“She was probably eyeing our
Materia from the beginning.”{PAUSE}“It looks like she went North.
Let's hurry after her and
get our Materia back!”

{Barret}
“She was after our Materia from
the start!!”{PAUSE}“She went North!
When I get my hand on her,
I'll get our Materia back!”{PAUSE}“C'mon! We're goin' after her!”

{Tifa}
“She was after our Materia from the
beginning.”{PAUSE}“She won't get away with this!
I'm pretty sure she ran off North.
Let's go after her!!”

{Red XIII}
“Her objective was stealing our
Materia from the beginning.”{PAUSE}“…sniff…
North! She ran off to the North!”{PAUSE}“I'm not going to let her get away
with this! Hurry, hurry!
We have to get our Materia back!”

{Cait Sith}
“She must've been after our Materia from
the beginning.”{PAUSE}“We can't just let her get away, right?
Then, let's hurry after her!
Which way? It's North, the North! It's
a message from the stars!”

{Cid}
“No doubt about it!
That kid was after our Materia
from the start!!”{PAUSE}“Hmm…
Looks like she went North.”{PAUSE}“Don't drag your asses!
We're going right NOW!
That $#@^% is history!!”

{Vincent}
“Seems as though all that
she was after was our Materia.”{PAUSE}“We can't just let her get away.
She ran to the North…”{PAUSE}“We must go after her and
retrieve our Materia back.”

{Barret}
“Hey, we gotta problem!
Our Materia's all gone!!”

{Red XIII}
“O…OH NO!
All of our Materia…gone!?”
